paragraphs: The popular singer Max Korzh will give a big concert in Prague. It will take place on June 22, 2024, at the football stadium "Fortuna Arena" (Eden Arena) in the Vršovice district.
Ticket sales will start on Tuesday, February 20th, at 10:00 on the artist's official website at this link.

Max's concerts are a rare occurrence. There was only one in the entire past year. The Prague concert will be a memorable meeting of the artist with his fans - both locals and visitors from all over the world.

Max Korzh, one of the brightest and most popular artists of our time. His performances always attract thousands of spectators, mosh pits, and incredible youthful energy. It's an opportunity to immerse yourself in a world of sincere emotions, unity, and experiences.
In Prague, the musician will perform both well-loved hits and new songs.
When: June 22, 2024 (Saturday), doors open at 4:00 PM, concert starts at 7:00 PM.
Where: Fortuna Arena, U Slavie 1540/2a, Prague 10 - Vršovice (view on map);
Tickets will go on sale on February 20th at 10:00 on the artist's website: https://maxkorzh.eu/
Subscribe to our TELEGRAM channel, where news comes out faster.
